about_the_game: Experience the whole first act of this story-driven 2D platformer - Infinium: A Spaceboy's Tale! Unveil dark secrets as you traverse through Leo's biggest dreams. Face various creatures with unique behavior sets, unlock new skills, and time your jumps well! Deep dive into the world of Infinium. Leo is waiting for you!

short_description: Follow the journey of Leo in a classical 2D platformer. Where 2 different worlds come together uncover an intriguing story. Explore diverse lands, fight unique enemies, and unlock new skills.
